location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 15 of 1833 from David Anderson Blane, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire to Charles Norris, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is reporting on a 'revolution' that has taken place in the town of Bushire; Prince Reza Kooli Mirza as been expelled from the town, and the authority of the Governor of Bushire now rests with Jemal Khan Bushiry. The letter provides some background information on the 'immediate cause of the rebellion'. It describes how events leading to the removal of the Governor played out, and provides a brief assessment on the prospects of the insurgents.
